title: Co-organizing the CCCï¼‡23
content:
"KAIST SoC graduate (2021) Dr. Sewon Park (advisor prof. Martin), currently Postdoc at Kyoto University/RIMS (Research Institute for Mathematical Sciences), has had the honor of co-organizing the "12th international Conference on Continuity, Computability, Constructivity "(CCC'23):
https://www.i.h.kyoto-u.ac.jp/ccc2023/
Sewon is an expert on reliable/verified computing with real numbers and other continuous (=non-discrete/ized) data types.
He has contributed (to) two talks and has chaired two talks, as well as organizing and guiding the conference excursion
to Heian Jingu Shrine and Nanzenji Temple.
Attached is a picture of the conference participants with Dr. Park to the right.
